## SampledTimer.(constructor)

Creates a `SampledTimer` instance. Must still be added to statistics if it should be logged!

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(statistics: Statistics, name: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  statistics | [Statistics](./harp-mapview.statistics.md) | Statistics to use for management. |
|  name | string | Name of the timer. Use colons to build a hierarchy. |
